Quick Actions
Workflow Actions
Quick Commands:
  • /workflow or /w - Open workflow
  • /page or /p - Open page/funnel
  • /form or /f - Open form
  • /survey or /s - Open survey
  • /contact or /c - Search contacts and view details
  • /audit or /a - Search contacts and view audit logs
  • /builder or /b - Open current page in builder
Keyboard Shortcuts:

Cmd+Shift+K or / - Open command palette

Cmd+Shift+B - Open in page builder

(Use Ctrl on Windows/Linux)
